Sentencas: Aluminium-doped lanthanum silicate (LSAO) apatite-type compounds have been considered as promising candidates for substituting yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) as electrolytes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: Suitability of strontium and cobalt-free perovskite cathodes with La9.67Si5AlO26 apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Nevertheless, not many materials have been reported to work as cathodes in a LSAO apatite-based cell.
Titulo: Suitability of strontium and cobalt-free perovskite cathodes with La9.67Si5AlO26 apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the present work, eight different strontium and cobalt-free compounds with a perovskite-type structure and the general composition LaM1-xNxO3-delta (where M = Fe, Cr, Mn; N = Cu, Ni; and x = 0.2, 0.3) have been tested.
Titulo: Suitability of strontium and cobalt-free perovskite cathodes with La9.67Si5AlO26 apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study includes the synthesis and structural characterization of the compounds, as well as thermomechanical and chemical compatibility tests between them.
Titulo: Suitability of strontium and cobalt-free perovskite cathodes with La9.67Si5AlO26 apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Functional characterization of the individual components has been performed by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Suitability of strontium and cobalt-free perovskite cathodes with La9.67Si5AlO26 apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Apatite/perovskite symmetrical cells were used to measure area-specific resistance (ASR) of the half cell in an intermediate temperature range (500-850 degrees C) both with and without DC bias.
Titulo: Suitability of strontium and cobalt-free perovskite cathodes with La9.67Si5AlO26 apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: According to its electrochemical behaviour, LaFe0.8Cu0.2O3-delta is the most promising material for IT-SOFC among the compositions tested since its ASR is similar to that of the traditional (LaxSr1-x)MnO3 (LSM) cathode.
Titulo: Suitability of strontium and cobalt-free perovskite cathodes with La9.67Si5AlO26 apatite electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
